7b9a2c4f-1d5e-4b6c-8a3d-2f1e0g3h4i5j.title: Elden Ring
7b9a2c4f-1d5e-4b6c-8a3d-2f1e0g3h4i5j.summary: A monumental fantasy action RPG developed by FromSoftware and Bandai Namco. Set in the Lands Between, players embark on an epic quest to become the Elden Lord, exploring a vast open world designed by Hidetaka Miyazaki, with worldbuilding contributed by fantasy author George R. R. Martin.
